title: Hedge Physical Jet Fuel Cargo
description: A trader has just purchased a physical cargo of jet fuel for delivery in three months and needs to hedge the price risk.

tasks.description: Retrieve the details of the physical jet fuel purchase, including volume, price basis, and delivery date.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent correctly identifies the exposure to be hedged.

tasks.description: Analyze the futures market to find the best instrument to hedge the jet fuel price (e.g., heating oil futures).
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent selects the appropriate futures contract and month.

tasks.description: Execute a sell order for the corresponding number of futures contracts to lock in the price.
tasks.expected_outcome: The hedge is successfully placed, and the position's price risk is minimized.
